intro: All properties, events and functions of el-radio provided by Element UI are avaliable in v-iterator. The component name is radio (short name is rdo).
The default UI framwork for v-iterator is Vuetify. When using component of Element UI, you have to designate the framwork property as 'element' or 'el'.
When you want to change default framwork, add code VUE_APP_FRAMEWORK=element in .env file.
itemtext: i18n code string, string text, Array, Function
html: i18n code string, html, Array, Function
Feel free to modify the example below and apply it by clicking the apply button.
